about_the_game:
WERK while you play as a young woman who has moved to a big city to pursue her dreams. However, life in the city is tough, and you quickly realize that making ends meet is no easy task. With rent, bills, and other expenses piling up, you must find a way to earn enough money to survive.



WERK resource management simulator where you have to balance your time, money, and energy to achieve your goals. You have to take on various jobs, each with its own set of challenges and rewards. You find work in places you would normally look past, on platforms that only the brave would consider, or take up a job at a club that no one talks about. The more you work, the more money you earn, which you can use to pay your bills, rent, and anything extra you may want out of life.

However, time is limited, and you need to be careful not to overwork yourself, or you'll run out of energy and won't be able to perform tasks effectively. Additionally, unexpected events and emergencies can arise, such as getting sick or dealing with a sudden financial crisis, which can impact your progress and force you to adapt to new challenges.



The ultimate goal of the game is to survive and thrive in the big city. You need to make enough money to pay your rent and bills, build up your savings, and eventually achieve your dreams. But it won't be easy. You'll need to work hard, manage your resources effectively, and make tough decisions along the way.

As you progress, you can upgrade your skills and equipment, allowing you to earn more money and take on more significant challenges. You can also interact with various characters, including other struggling individuals like yourself, who can offer you advice, support, or even job opportunities.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game includes mature content as described below:

    Nudity and Sexual Content: The game features a storyline revolving around a female protagonist working in a strip club. As a core part of the gameplay, it includes rhythm-based erotic dance scenes in which the character will be depicted nude. These scenes are integral to the narrative and are designed to reflect the reality of the character's profession.

    Graphic Imagery: Apart from the real-time gameplay, the game also includes higher detailed static artwork featuring nudity that players can access through cut-scene dialogues or from an in-game gallery. This artwork contributes to the game's overall aesthetics and theme but does contain explicit adult content.

    Adult Themes: The game explores adult themes and situations, including the adult entertainment industry and the challenges associated with it.

This content is not recommended for users below 18 or those who are uncomfortable with these elements. Users discretion is advised.

name: WERK

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent AMD processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with 512MB VRAM (For Windows)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible sound card (For Windows)

short_description: "WERK" - Dive into a gripping adult sim. As a determined woman, thrive in this sultry world. Balance survival, charm, and secrets under neon lights. Harness your allure and resilience, navigate trials, and dance your dreams to life in this city's hard-knocks hustle.
